languages.text: {n}Дрожащий негоциант угодничающе кланяется.{/n} "Вот спасибо, Ваша Светлость, вот приятно слышать... Не обманем ваших надежд, будем ладно себя вести и лишний раз у высоких господ под ногами не вертеться!"

{n}The trembling merchant bows in adulation.{/n} "Why, thank you, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. It's such a pleasure to hear that. We're going to live up to your trust, be on our best behaviour, and not needlessly get in the way of high lords and ladies!"
languages.original_text: {n}Дрожащий негоциант угодничающе кланяется.{/n} "Вот спасибо, Ваша Светлость, вот приятно слышать... Не обманем ваших надежд, будем ладно себя вести и лишний раз у высоких господ под ногами не вертеться!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The trembling merchant bows in adulation.{/n} "Why, thank you, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. It's such a pleasure to hear that. We're going to live up to your trust, be on our best behaviour, and not needlessly get in the way of high lords and ladies!"

{n}The trembling merchant bows in adulation.{/n} "Why, thank you, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. It's such a pleasure to hear that. We're going to live up to your trust, be on our best behaviour, and not needlessly get in the way of high lords and ladies!"

{n}The trembling merchant bows in adulation.{/n} "Why, thank you, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. It's such a pleasure to hear that. We're going to live up to your trust, be on our best behaviour, and not needlessly get in the way of high lords and ladies!"

{n}The trembling merchant bows in adulation.{/n} "Why, thank you, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. It's such a pleasure to hear that. We're going to live up to your trust, be on our best behaviour, and not needlessly get in the way of high lords and ladies!"

{n}The trembling merchant bows in adulation.{/n} "Why, thank you, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. It's such a pleasure to hear that. We're going to live up to your trust, be on our best behaviour, and not needlessly get in the way of high lords and ladies!"

{n}The trembling merchant bows in adulation.{/n} "Why, thank you, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. It's such a pleasure to hear that. We're going to live up to your trust, be on our best behaviour, and not needlessly get in the way of high lords and ladies!"

languages.text: {n}这个浑身颤抖的商人谄媚地鞠了一躬。{/n}“谢谢您，大人。听您这么说，我们实在是太高兴了。我们一定不会辜负您的信任！我们一定会好好表现，绝对不去惹恼那些尊贵的大人们和夫人们！”
languages.original_text: {n}The trembling merchant bows in adulation.{/n} "Why, thank you, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. It's such a pleasure to hear that. We're going to live up to your trust, be on our best behaviour, and not needlessly get in the way of high lords and ladies!"

traits.locale_text: {n}这个浑身颤抖的商人谄媚地鞠了一躬。{/n}“谢谢您，大人。听您这么说，我们实在是太高兴了。我们一定不会辜负您的信任！我们一定会好好表现，绝对不去惹恼那些尊贵的大人们和夫人们！”

languages.text: {n}商人は震えながらもお辞儀をして称賛する。{/n}「ありがとうございます、陛下。そう言っていただけると嬉しいです。あなたの信頼に答え、最も適切な態度を取り、至高卿方のお邪魔はいたしません！」
languages.original_text: {n}The trembling merchant bows in adulation.{/n} "Why, thank you, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. It's such a pleasure to hear that. We're going to live up to your trust, be on our best behaviour, and not needlessly get in the way of high lords and ladies!"

traits.locale_text: {n}商人は震えながらもお辞儀をして称賛する。{/n}「ありがとうございます、陛下。そう言っていただけると嬉しいです。あなたの信頼に答え、最も適切な態度を取り、至高卿方のお邪魔はいたしません！」

languages.text: {n}El tembloroso mercader se inclina en señal de adulación.{/n} «Vaya, gracias, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Es un placer oír eso. ¡Estaremos a la altura de su confianza, nos comportaremos lo mejor posible y no estorbaremos innecesariamente a los altos señores y señoras!».
languages.original_text: {n}The trembling merchant bows in adulation.{/n} "Why, thank you, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. It's such a pleasure to hear that. We're going to live up to your trust, be on our best behaviour, and not needlessly get in the way of high lords and ladies!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El tembloroso mercader se inclina en señal de adulación.{/n} «Vaya, gracias, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Es un placer oír eso. ¡Estaremos a la altura de su confianza, nos comportaremos lo mejor posible y no estorbaremos innecesariamente a los altos señores y señoras!».

languages.text: {n}Der zitternde Händler verneigt sich schmeichelnd.{/n} "Oh, ich danke Euch, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft. Es ist ein solches Vergnügen, das zu hören. Wir werden alles tun, um Euer Vertrauen zu rechtfertigen, uns von unserer besten Seite zeigen und den hohen Lords und Ladys nicht unnötig im Weg herumstehen!"
languages.original_text: {n}The trembling merchant bows in adulation.{/n} "Why, thank you, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. It's such a pleasure to hear that. We're going to live up to your trust, be on our best behaviour, and not needlessly get in the way of high lords and ladies!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der zitternde Händler verneigt sich schmeichelnd.{/n} "Oh, ich danke Euch, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft. Es ist ein solches Vergnügen, das zu hören. Wir werden alles tun, um Euer Vertrauen zu rechtfertigen, uns von unserer besten Seite zeigen und den hohen Lords und Ladys nicht unnötig im Weg herumstehen!"

languages.text: {n}Tremblant de tous ses membres, le marchand s'incline.{/n} « Merci infiniment, Votre Seigneurie. Ça fait plaisir à entendre. On vous décevra pas ; on saura se tenir et on se mettra plus en travers du chemin de la noblesse ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The trembling merchant bows in adulation.{/n} "Why, thank you, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. It's such a pleasure to hear that. We're going to live up to your trust, be on our best behaviour, and not needlessly get in the way of high lords and ladies!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Tremblant de tous ses membres, le marchand s'incline.{/n} « Merci infiniment, Votre Seigneurie. Ça fait plaisir à entendre. On vous décevra pas ; on saura se tenir et on se mettra plus en travers du chemin de la noblesse ! »

languages.text: {n}Tir tir titreyen tüccar, dalkavukça eğiliyor.{/n} "Teşekkürlerimi sunuyorum {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Bunu duymak büyük bir mutluluk kaynağı. Güveninize layık olmaya çalışacak, en doğru şekilde davranacak ve yüksek mevkideki lordların ve leydilerin yoluna gereksiz yere çıkmayacağız!"
languages.original_text: {n}The trembling merchant bows in adulation.{/n} "Why, thank you, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. It's such a pleasure to hear that. We're going to live up to your trust, be on our best behaviour, and not needlessly get in the way of high lords and ladies!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Tir tir titreyen tüccar, dalkavukça bir şekilde eğiliyor.{/n} "Teşekkürlerimi sunuyorum {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Bunu duymak büyük bir mutluluk kaynağı. Güveninize layık olmaya çalışacak, en doğru şekilde davranacak ve yüksek mevkideki lordların ve leydilerin yoluna gereksiz yere çıkmayacağız!"
